---
title: "Key Collaborators"
---

```{css, echo=FALSE}
@media (max-width: 400px) and (min-height: 600px) {
    .boxes {
        display: block;

        .col {
            width: 100%;
            margin=0 0 10px 0;
        }
    }
}

.personimg img {
    object-fit: contain;
    max-height: 200px;
    min-height: 200px;
}

.boxes {
    justify-content: left;
}

.col:hover {
    background-color: #dcdcdc;
}

.col {
    min-height: 150px !important;
    max-height: 150px !important;
}

.col p {
    margin-top: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 0px
}
.col img {
    height: auto;
    max-height: 150px;
}

h3 {
    text-align: center;
}
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

generate_image_link <- function(image_path, url) {
    cat(
        glue::glue(
            "::: col
            <a href='{url}'><img src='{image_path}' /> </a>
            :::\n\n"
        )
    )
}


```
